Class User

java.lang.Object
GuiTools.User
public class User extends Object
The User class represents a user in the application.

  • Method Details

    • checkUser

      public static Object[] checkUser(String login, String password) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Checks if the provided login and password match a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      login - The user's login.
      password - The user's password.
      Returns:
      An array of user data if a match is found, or null otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the required class is not found.
